entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
